anyOf.title: Distribution
anyOf.description: A specific representation of a dataset. A dataset might be available in multiple serializations that may differ in various ways, including natural language, media-type or format, schematic organization, temporal and spatial resolution, level of detail or profiles (which might specify any or all of the above).

anyOf.title: Distribution - data service
anyOf.description: Physical embodiment of the dataset as a particular data service.

title.title: Title
title.description: A name given to the distribution.

description.title: Description
description.description: A free-text account of the Distribution.

documentation.title: documentation
documentation.description: A page or document about this Distribution.

specification.title: specification
specification.description: An established standard to which the distribution conforms.

access_service.title: access service
access_service.description: A site or end-point that gives access to the distribution of the dataset.

anyOf.title: Distribution - downloadable file
anyOf.description: Physical embodiment of the dataset in a particular format.

title.title: Title
title.description: A name given to the distribution.

byte_size.title: Byte size
byte_size.description: The size of a Distribution in bytes.

format.title: Format
format.description: The file format of the Distribution.

conforms_to_schema.title: conforms to schema
conforms_to_schema.description: An established standard to which the distribution conforms.

media_type.title: media type
media_type.description: The media type of the distribution as defined by IANA

access_url.title: access URL
access_url.description: A URL that gives access to a Distribution of the Dataset.

download_url.title: download URL
